p: Due to the limited DENV surveillance in vectors, information of the circulating DENV serotypes is scarce. In official reports by the Brazilian Ministry of Health (MoH), Maranh√£o was one of the few states that did not present information about circulating serotypes in 2017. Despite this, the detection of the DENV-2 in this study is consistent with the epidemiological information reported for the country in this period. According to the MoH, DENV-2 was predominant in Brazil in 2017 and corresponded to 54.3% of infections countrywide, differently from what has been reported from 2009 to 2016, when DENV-1 was the predominant serotype [ 97].
